channel.title: Got an SSD
channel.description:
OCZ Vertex, 230mb read, 130mb write speeds.
did some benchmarks and i get 220mb read 155mb write so thats cool. just set it up and testing out out, shitload of win7 tweaks for speed & deleted tons of stuff (this is 30gb SSD so i gotta be very careful with what i put on here)
will post more of how good it is soon

item.title: Got an SSD
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:14, topic:328168”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=424551.msg3124911#msg3124911 date=1265931106]

[quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=424551.msg3124792#msg3124792 date=1265924186]

What filesystem are you guys using on your SSDs?
[/quote]FAT32 Of Course

Probably so he can write to it from linux or something.

Why would you use fat32?

Learn to quote, then learn to sarcasm.
[/quote][/quote]
you can write to ntfs from linux…

en.wikipedia.org

NTFS-3G

NTFS-3G is an open source cross-platform implementation of the Microsoft Windows NTFS file system with read-write support. NTFS-3G often uses the FUSE file system interface, so it can run unmodified on many different operating systems. It is runnable on Linux, FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenSolaris, BeOS, QNX, WinCE, Nucleus, VxWorks, Haiku, MorphOS, Minix, macOS and OpenBSD. It is licensed under either the GNU General Public License or a proprietary license[citation needed]. It is a partial fo NTFS-3G was...

Read full topic

item.title: Got an SSD
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

When you can get 200gb or so for $100 i am ready to upgrade

[quote=“Thug-life, post:3, topic:328168”]eXemplar was showing me this on irc:

http://www.youtube.com/user/eggsampler#p/a/u/0/V5_FXgpbtBI

Having dragon age and knowing the absolutely terrible load times on a regular HDD, i nearly fainted. I keep putting off buying an SSD, but i really need one now.[/quote]I wouldn’t call them terrible, i load a new area in anything between 10 and 20 seconds depending on how big it is. Terrible loading times would be shit like Stronghold 2 where it takes like a minute

Read full topic

item.title: Got an SSD
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

If only the price was a bit lower. Although I guess you use this as a step between your HDD and RAM? Shit you don’t use is put on the HDD, and shit you do use is put on the SSD?

Expect them to become a fair bit cheaper soon, Intel just had a breakthrough on 25nm flash or something.

Read full topic
